00019 class Galleria_View_Tags extends Galleria_Viewelement
00020 {
00021 
00031     public static function info($tags)
00032     {
00033         $text = '<div id="tags">';
00034         foreach ($tags as $tag) {
00035             $text .= '<span style="font-size: ' . self::_calcSize($tag->weight, $tag->sum) . '%;"><a href="' . self::$_http_url . 'tag/?id=' . $tag->tid . '">' . $tag->name . '</a></span>';
00036         }
00037         return $text . '</div>';
00038     }
00039 
00049     public static function lists($tags, $pid)
00050     {
00051         $text = '<ul id="tags-' . $pid . '" class="picturetags">';
00052         foreach ($tags as $tag) {
00053             $text .= '<li><a href="' . self::$_http_url . 'tag/?id=' . $tag->tid . '" id="tag-' . $tag->tid . '">' . $tag->name . '</a></li>';
00054         }
00055         if (Galleria_Auth::isLogged() && Galleria_Auth::getObject()->isInAdminGroup())
00056             $text .= '<li class="addtag"><a href="#addpictag">[Add new tag]</a></li>';
00057         return $text . '</ul>';
00058     }
00059 
00069     private static function _calcSize($weight, $sum)
00070     {
00071         return (100+ceil(10*$weight/$sum)*10);
00072     }
